name: Cyber Cupid 3♥3♥
description:
In the year 3♥3♥, people need help with their broken hearts (ⅈ▱ⅈ)! Waves of the broken hearted </3 are walking through life miserable :c, and it's up to YOU, Cyber Cupid, to mend them with friends or love that they are compatible with (˵ ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°˵)ﾉ⌒♡*:･。. Help us Cyber Cupid, you're our only hope! ᕦ(▀̿ ̿ -▀̿ ̿ )つ Game play: Cyber 

Cupid 3♥3♥ is a top down bubble bobble style game where you try to shoot an arrow through the broken hearted into other broken hearted </3 that they match☯. Matching them allows them to find love and friendship ♡｡ﾟ.(*♡´‿` 人´‿` ♡*)ﾟ♡ °・. You can also use your arrow to push them back to buy them time until you can find them their match. Don't let anyone go unloved (⌯˃̶᷄ ﹏ ˂̶᷄⌯)ﾟ or it's game over :'c Try to mend all the broken hearts to achieve ultimate world high score- I mean happiness ¯\_( ಥ ‿ ಥ )_/¯!

Made With:
